import React from 'react' import './Table.css' import moment from 'moment' const Table = props => { const { purchaseDate, name, symbol, amountPurchased, purchasePrice, curPrice: { USD } } = props return (

Investments

Person Name Age Company Name Country City
{moment(purchaseDate).format("MM/DD/YY")} {moment(purchaseDate).format("hh:mma")} {name} {symbol} {amountPurchased.toFixed(8)} ${purchasePrice.toFixed(2)} ${(purchasePrice * amountPurchased).toFixed(2)} ${USD.toFixed(2)} ${(amountPurchased * USD).toFixed(2)} ${(amountPurchased * (USD - purchasePrice)).toFixed(2)} {(((amountPurchased * USD) / (purchasePrice * amountPurchased)) -1).toFixed(2)}% ${(purchasePrice * 1.025).toFixed(2)} ${(purchasePrice * 1.05).toFixed(2)}
) } export default Table
